CustomField.description: Req # 2650 : DQ Last Modified & Plan Date & Past Due Value EUR divided by OIF Value EUR
CustomField.formula: IF( (Past_Due__c = true && DQ_LastModifiedDate__c = true && Opportunity__r.DQ_Plan_Date__c = true ), 1, 0)
CustomField.label: DQ LastModified & Plan Date & Past Due %
